unnormalised: Breaking news! Dishtaka khobor! USD to INR exchange rate aiz khub halon cholon dista. Aiz disachi survat ₹83.25 prati $, punn adich tem ₹83.10 meren demlem ani magir portun voir ailem. Analysts mhontat ki tem kainch global market activity ani FIIs (Foreign Institutional Investors) vhodd bhumika nibhovtat mhunn.
normalised: Toddech khobor! Dista asa U-S-D ani I-N-R-acho vinimoy dar aiz thoḍo badolta. Rupee teentaalisa point don panch doller ekak asa mhunn disachi survat keli, punn tea voilean rupee teentaalisa point ek shunya meren khala gela ani magir porthun voir udi marli. Analist sangtaat ki te jagtik bajarpeṭhentli cholval ani F-I-I-s (Videshi Sansthagat Guṇṭavṇukdar) ek mhotvachi bhumika nibhavtaat.

unnormalised: Distai, Euro-kui Rupiyacher thodi takod asa. Adim, tumkam dor 1 EUR-ak laginche ₹89.50 melltale, punn atam tem ₹90 laginch ravta. Experts suchoitat ki RBI-n hea satolleant kelea ucharancher loksh diunk zai; tancho asar poddunk xokta.
normalised: Diis dissa Europaichi Mudra Rupeache vireddh thaḍi cholta. Adhim tumka ek E-U-R-ak rupee ekunyashi point panch shunya melthe, punn aathaa te rupee navved meren thambta. Hya velle R-B-I hya hafte ghoshnaancher nazar thevchhi mhunn experts suchavtat; teamchean vostunk fer podta.

unnormalised: Ani tumi UK-k vochunk yevzonn kortat zalear, GBP azunui khub takodvan asa. Mhaka adim £ dor ekleak laginche ₹105 distale, punn shop around kara! Mhojea cousin-ak Thomas Cook-an thodi bori rate mell'li – taka dor Pound-ak laginche ₹104.75 melle. Tumhi convert korche adim check korunk zai, kiteak na?
normalised: Ani tumhi U-K-ak bhonvddiak vochpaak sodtali zalear, G-B-P aazun-ui thor asta. Pound ekak rupee ek shimbbor ani panchachi daar adhim dekhle, punn dukanaamni sodh! Mhojem bhainne Thomas Cookantle thode bare daar melle – tenka ek poundak rupee ek shimbbor ani char point saat panch melle. Rupayent bodlechea adhim check korop zaai, kiteak neem?
